content: Mary sta indossando lo stesso vestito che stava indossando ieri.
translations: eng:Mary is wearing the same dress she had on yesterday
eng:Mary is wearing the same dress she was wearing yesterday
eng:Mary is wearing the same dress that she had on yesterday
eng:Mary is wearing the same dress that she was wearing yesterday
